about_the_game:
Home from a long day of carving the fresh powder, it's time to let loose and bundle up, or let that after-ski spirit roll over you like a cozy avalanche. Share warm cheers with your buddies on the ski resort porch in these new outfits, including warm fur coats, hats and sweaters. If you're more of an after-ski enthusiast, then adorn the warm cocoa hat, show off your new snazzy ski outfit and let the special Scandinavian Intergalactic Infinity Cruises designed beer tray Vruumba serve up some drinks!

Included Content:

  • Regular Ski goggles
  • Golden Ski goggles
  • Red Ski outfit
  • Black Ski outfit
  • Large Warm Coat
  • Warm Blue Hat
  • Fullbody Skiing Suit
  • Warm Cocoa Hat
  • White Snow Shoes
  • Blue Snow Shoes
  • Gold Snow Shoes
  • Striped Ushanka
  • Racoon Hat
  • Vruumba with beer tray
  • Snow Vruumba Trail Effect

Share warm cheers with your buddies on the ski resort porch in these new outfits, including warm fur coats, hats and sweaters. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones
